Condor:

Condor was tired. He had been running by hours and he had lost a lot 
mechfluid... If he didn't found help soon he could be dead.

Condor found a cave and he came in, he sat on rock. He opened his 
comm link trying to contact the starjumper... but he failed. He tried 
several times, but every time he failed... After a while he opened 
his comm link trying to contact every maximal that could help him...

Condor didn't know it but Maximals dificulty could find his com link 
signal.
